title: GN4-1 Research and Education Networking - G…ANT
objective:
The overall objective is to provide a stable environment for the implementation of G…ANT as the European Communications Commons for the European Research Area, which will provide the best possible digital infrastructure to ensure that Europe remains in the forefront of research. G…ANTís extensive and long-standing contacts with large data disciplines such as biology, radioastronomy and high-energy physics help shape the evolution of the networking facilities required. This is complemented by partner contacts with research domains that are new users of high-performance networks and services, such as: digital preservation, real-time art and humanities.
The vision is to position the G…ANT partnership optimally to achieve the strategic objectives of the FPA while ensuring the continuity and improvement of the services successfully offered under the GN3plus FP7 project. The extensive experience of the G…ANT partnership in providing high-quality and innovative services has been applied to the preparation phase of this proposal. 
The following GN4-1 work package objectives deserve to be highlighted:
ï	Maintain and enhance the production service and achieve cost reductions without negative effects on network service levels.
ï	Coordinate with the other European e-infrastructure efforts both individually and in the framework of the increased coordination effort.
ï	Prepare a new round of Open Call projects to start immediately after the end of the GN4-1 project.
ï	Expand the footprint and the depth of services offered to roaming users with enhanced trust and identity services through Federation as a Service and with group and attribute management added to eduGAIN. 
ï	Develop online real-time services to improve the ease and function of videconferencing, open learning support and general multimedia use.
ï	Review the existing service catalogue using the Product Lifecycle Management process to assess the cost/benefits of each carefully to define the future service strategy.
